title: How to make top menu bar (time, wifi, battery etc) disappear when I have open apps.
content:
How to make top menu bar (time, wifi, battery etc) disappear when I have open apps.

When I open an application, often the top menu bar which shows the time wifi battery etc does not go away. 

This is annoying because many apps have a menu at the top as well so I cannot tap on them. If I do, the phone menu shows up.
